These are some common 
FAQs. 
Please type in the 
corresponding number to 
find out more. 
1. I have a missing item 
from an order. 
2. I received a damaged 
item 
3. How do I cancel my 
order after making a 
purchase? 
4. How do I report a 
problem? 
5. What are the payment 
methods? 
6. How long does Delivery 
take? 
7. How do I submit 
feedback? 
8. How do I contact 
customer support?
If you encounter an item that has not been received, please go to the navigation bar and click on 'Report Form', or click the Report link.
We apologise for the inconvenience. To file a report, please go to the navigation bar and click on 'Report Form, or click the Report link.

Unfortunately, you will be 
unable to cancel the order 
once a purchase is made.
To report a problem, please go to the navigation bar and click 'Report Form', or click the Report link.

We accept VISA, 
Mastercard as well as 
Paypal.

Delivery at most takes 1 
working day. This ensures 
that you will receive your 
products as fresh as 
possible.
To submit your much appreciated feedback, please go to the navigation bar and click 'Feedback Form', or click the Feedback link.
To contact our staff, please email us @ KMBusiness@gmail.com, or click the Email Us link.

We accept VISA, 
Mastercard and Paypal

We accept most major 
credit cards, and Paypal

Unfortunately, we do not. 
However we do accept 
VISA, mastercard, and 
PayPal.
